title: Style Guide
description: Guidelines and graphic assets for TNS digital content.

body.raw:
<Callout>

This site is a work in progress. If you see dummy text on a page or broken links, it means we're still working on it!

</Callout>

We create event graphics for recurring events (like book clubs, committee meetings, PTA meetings etc.) and one-time special events.

## Best Practices
* Use a common application like Canva or Photoshop
* Store original and exported assets in GDrive
* File convention: `EventName_YYYYMMDD_shape.psd/png/jpg/pdf`

## Logos

## Colors

## Downloads
